content: Add File Selection Validation in Delete Dialog - validate selected files exist before deletion, add detailed logging, show user exactly which files will be deleted
Enhance API Route Validation - add detailed logging of file paths being processed, add validation that file paths match expected user ownership
Fix Row Selection State Management - add selection validation before opening delete dialog, clear stale selections when data refreshes
Add Pre-Delete Confirmation Details - show actual file names/paths that will be deleted, add file count validation
Add Selection Consistency Checks in DataGrid - add validation that selected items exist in current data, clear invalid selections automatically
